projects.title: Black Crow Tours
projects.description: Black Crow tours was built with the Django framework on the backend, and pure HTML/CSS on the front. I used googles design patterns to style the flex-box grids. Some JavaScript was added for minor cards and scroll behavior.

projects.title: Sample API Site
projects.description: Sample API site I built in Gatsby to show a sample architecture of React data fetching, actions with Hooks (State and Effects), and minor styling. Could be used as initial boilerplate.
